BackstoryDef.title: medieval slave
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up pulling carts and digging holes on a medieval world. Simple manual labor is [PAWN_possessive] oldest companion - along with the master's lash.\n\n[PAWN_pronoun] didn't learn to read until age nine.

BackstoryDef.title: medieval lordling
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] was a minor noble in an old kingdom on a medieval world. [PAWN_pronoun] grew up in a manor made of stone, served by bowing lowerclassmen.\n\nSuch a life teaches no technical skills and instils a lifelong aversion to manual labor - but [PAWN_nameDef] learned early the ways of social manipulation.

BackstoryDef.title: convent child
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: The child of an illicit affair, [PAWN_nameDef] was bought up by nuns in a medieval convent. [PAWN_pronoun] learned the value of hard work and submission, but was taught that technology is heretical.
